snippet: Eric T. Schneiderman has begun an inquiry into whether Turing Pharmaceuticals violated antitrust rules by restricting distribution of a drug, Daraprim, as a way to thwart generic competition.
abstract: New York State Atty Gen Eric T Schneiderman starts investigation into Turing Pharmaceuticals, which skyrocketed price of infection drug, causing backlash against high pharmaceutical prices; Schneiderman's office has addressed letter of inquiry directly to Turing head Martin Shkreli.
lead_paragraph: Eric T. Schneiderman has begun an inquiry into whether Turing Pharmaceuticals violated antitrust rules by restricting distribution of a drug, Daraprim, as a way to thwart generic competition.

headline.main: New York Attorney General Examining Whether Turing Restricted Drug Access
headline.print_headline: New York Attorney General Examining if Turing Restricted Drug Access
